name: Digital Resume/CV - Notion Template
description: Applying for jobs? Looking for a way to professionally market yourself online? Use this digital resume Notion template!Impress the companies that you are interviewing for with this Notion template. Display your experience and skills beautifully; all you have to do is fill in your information! Includes:Getting started guide with tips & tricks to make your Notion resume stand outA completely customizable Notion template that you can duplicate and make your own.
features: Getting started guide with tips & tricks to make your Notion resume stand out; A completely customizable Notion template that you can duplicate and make your own.
